amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 118-685 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report annually to Congress to identify jurisdictions that fail to comply with a request lawfully made by the Department of Homeland Security under section 236 or 287 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1226 and 1357) to comply with a detainer for, or notify about the release of, an individual.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
